title: Frank Lloyd Wright Doormat—Blossom
description:
Adapted from Frank Lloyd Wright's® (American, 1867-1959) entry window design for the George Blossom House in Chicago, Illinois, c. 1892, our doormat is a unique architectural tribute made of natural handwoven coir fiber and durable black rubber.

  • Dimensions: 30 x 18 in.
  • Materials: Natural coir fiber, rubber

Additional Shipping $15 per Order.

This item cannot be shipped to a destination outside the United States.
